questions_and_notes: For consistency with sbl-CF3hr, shouldn't the sea ice portion of a cell also be included here?  If so, specify cell_methods "area: time: mean".  Also, should include in the comment or the description: "surface upward flux of water vapor due to sublimation of surface snow and ice".     I don't think "where land" is needed.  If it is, then should be "where land over all_area_types"
cell_methods: area: mean where land time: mean
long_name: Surface Snow and Ice Sublimation Flux
comment: The snow and ice sublimation flux is the loss of snow and ice mass per unit area from the surface resulting from their direct conversion to water vapor that enters the atmosphere.
